Author: homgerygorl
Text: Ultimatley the only way to not decay your teeth is to not purge, but recovery is a long road (and one you may not be following)  Gargle warm water and baking soda before you brush after a purge  floss after every meal  Antiseptic mouth wash  Enamel guarding toothpaste (pronamel, sensodyne)  Avoid sugary AND acidic drinks (this includes coffee, citrus juice and lemon tea)
